name: SKWSH
slogan: SKWSH is a social networking platform connecting users in person within 96hrs of matching
description: SKWSH, guarantees dates within 96 hours by matching users on mutual interests, immediate availability, and distance. Going one step further by suggesting date locations and letting both parties know when they’ve arrived at the venue; eliminating unnecessary back-and-forth and the uncertainty of meeting in person.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer & CTO
jobs.description:
[SKWSH](https://getskwsh.com) is looking for a Fullstack Developer/ CTO/technical co-founder with extensive Flutter and Python experience who can lead a very small team and work closely with the CEO and COO (the other co-founders). 

SKWSH is a dating app that focuses on creating in-person dates shortly after matching. Our goal is for people to make real-life connections with those around them and take the online dating experience off the app. SKWSH also gives dating suggestions to venues around you based on categories (nightlife, food, outdoors, etc.) and also soft tracks your date to the venue so you know you aren’t getting stood up! (Right now because of COVID-19 we are working rapidly to implement virtual dating into our app). As of now we are remote only and are looking for a Fullstack Developer that is also interested in joining as our third and final co-founder/CTO.

Responsibilities and Duties
● The technical build and maintaince of our SKWSH app.
● Planning for the integration of new features, including third-party integrations.
● Regular reporting for board-level purposes.
● Ensure code security and legal compliance.
● Mentoring junior team members as the team grows.
● Working closely with co-founders to scale SKWSH app.

Qualifications
● Strong experience in technology product builds with a preference for mobile app development and knowledge of dating apps.
● Knowledge of mobile app development on both iOS and Android, and fullstack development (Flutter, Python, and DevOps experience)
● Ability to hit deadlines
● Respectful communication skills to interface with other team members
● Thinks outside the box and has a keen interest in new technologies.

Compensation
We’re a pre-launch early-stage startup so we’re willing to give equity to the perfect fit!
